properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hima hima hima,
hima hima
twendeni tukahubiri
(injili)
tukahubiri
kwa mataifa yote. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wachawi wote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana,
wazinzi wote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dunia yote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana,
wamrudie Muumba wao,
wamjue Bwana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tuponye majeraha ya moyo,
wamjue Bwana,
tu - uwajali wanyonge wote,
wamjue Bwana.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Walevi wote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana,
waongo wote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Kabila zote wakisikia,
wamjue Bwana,
wamrudie Muumba wao,
wamjue Bwana.
